page.title: 13Childrens Interests
page.content: The following survey concerns how children in Maghull and Lydiate entertain themselves.At Green Park Primary School Connect 4 was top of the list of favourite board games followed by Monopoly,Scrabble,Ludo Chess,Draughts,snakes and Ladders Cluedo,Game of Life and Perfection. Outdoor games that were popular included football,cricket,tick,hide and seek,rounders,tennis,netball, skipping,ball games,British bulldog and T.V. characters. This last game reflects the time spent watching television.In games the child acts as one of his or her favourite characters,at the moment the most popular are the characters from the "A" Team. Many children now have computors,out of a class of 31 19 had a computor and their games are also popular.
